title: Signs Suggesting That You Might Need Glasses
description: These days, you have many choices regarding places to purchase glasses. A growingly popular method is through online retailers. That said, you may be reluctant to get glasses. However, experiencing certain symptoms may leave you with no other choice.  The post Signs Suggesting That You Might Need Glasses appeared first on AV Club.

description: It’s a bird, it’s a plane, it’s… the trailer for the highly anticipated documentary about real-life superhero Christopher Reeve. title: Dexter: Original Sin: Dex’s Life Flashes Before His Eyes in New Prequel Trailer — Watch Video, Get Release Date
description: Prepare for a killer holiday season. Dexter‘s prequel series Original Sin, which will follow the original show’s central character during his teenage years, will be available to stream on Paramount+ (for subscribers with the Paramount+ With Showtime plan) beginning Friday, Dec. 13. The episodes will then hit the linear Paramount+ With Showtime cable network two […]
